DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether transcranial direct current stimulation of the cerebral swallow motor cortex in addition to standard care can enhance recovery of swallow function in acute dysphagic stroke patients compared to sham treatment plus standard care.
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation for Dysphagia Therapy in Acute Stroke Patients
DOC.criteria: dysphagia due to acute stroke preexisting dysphagia comorbidities that can possibly cause dysphagia psychiatric comorbidities pacemaker or other implanted electronic devices inability to give informed consent
